reference-code-html-content-block-pre:
Custom Background Color

The default background color of the Image Content Overlay is #666666 (gray-darker). In order to have a custom background color on the Image Content Overlay add the following data attribute to the Image Content Overlay container: data-palette-color="".

Custom Border Color

The default border color at the bottom of the Image Content Overlay is #999999 (gray-dark). In order to have a custom border color on the Image Content Overlay add the following data attribute to the Image Content Overlay container: data-palette-border-color="".

Choose from the following color options for the value of data-palette-color="" and data-palette-border-color="".

  • transparent
  • white
  • black
  • gray-darkest
  • gray-darker
  • gray-dark
  • gray-mid-dark
  • gray-mid-light
  • gray-light
  • gray-lighter
  • gray-lightest
  • blue-gray
  • blue-gray-darkest
  • blue-gray-darker
  • blue-gray-dark
  • blue-gray-mid-dark
  • blue-gray-mid-light
  • blue-gray-light
  • blue-gray-lighter
  • blue-gray-lightest
  • blue-sapphire
  • blue-sapphire-dark
  • blue-sapphire-mid
  • blue-sapphire-light
  • purple
  • purple-dark
  • purple-mid
  • purple-light
  • fuscia
  • fuscia-dark
  • fuscia-mid
  • fuscia-light
  • pink
  • pink-dark
  • pink-light
  • red
  • red-dark
  • red-mid
  • red-light
  • orange
